RelatedSentence: The indictment accuses the hackers of targeting the U.S. nuclear power , metals and solar products industries .
The indictment accuses the hackers of targeting the U.S. nuclear power , metals and solar products industries .
Attorney General Eric Holder and other federal law enforcement officials were announcing the indictments later Monday .
Holder says in a statement that the U.S. will not tolerate foreign government efforts to sabotage American companies .
